Text: this is cool and thx but um why is it all one song :/ idk why you put all the songs together but w/e.....thx lol

im sure you've figured it out by now that it's meant for continuous play -- no breaks.

cuesheet is provided for burning purposes & foobar2k playback

ok, months later ive come back to this torrent looking for a new version. alas it cannot be found. this is an epic mix. 1 hour + of pure new order ecstasy. if you like new order, you need this. if you dont know new order, this is a great download to sample their very best in one, chill mix.
